resources.string:
This app helps ensuring the safety of everyone and let their loved ones know about them in any kind of danger.

We will take contact numbers from you for emergency.
When user will shake the device with some good force or long press the volume down button when application is open, we will send a text message to the entered emergency contacts that you are in danger with your current location.
We will do the same every five minutes with your updated current location till you press the stop button in the application confirming that you are safe, and we will send a text message that you are safe.
For all this you have to give access to location and allow us to make phone calls and send text message.
